com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject

Class Structure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject.MapObject
      • com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject.Structure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Global

    public class Structure
extends MapObject
    Structures are MapObjects with varying collision boxes A single structure may have some parts of it causing collision, others not TODO: utilize ImageView viewport to show pieces from same file
    Author:
    nkoiv

        Render draws the Sprite of the MapObject on a given GraphicsContext
        Overrides:
        render in class MapObject
        Parameters:
        xOffset - Used to shift the objects xCoordinate so its drawn where the screen is
        yOffset - Used to shift the objects yCoordinate so its drawn where the screen is
        gc - GraphicsContext where the object is drawn
